25 #include "binaryUtils.hpp"
26 
27 namespace bitpit {
28 
29 namespace utils {
30 
31 namespace binary {
32 
41 void write(std::ostream &stream, const std::vector<bool> &container)
42 {
43  std::copy(container.begin(), container.end(), std::ostream_iterator<bool>(stream));
44 }
45 
54 void write(std::ostream &stream, const std::string &string)
55 {
56  size_t size = string.length() + 1;
57  write(stream, size);
58  write(stream, string.data(), size);
59 }
60 
69 void read(std::istream &stream, std::vector<bool> &container)
70 {
71  std::copy(std::istream_iterator<bool>(stream), {}, std::back_inserter(container));
72 }
73 
82 void read(std::istream &stream, std::vector<bool>::reference value)
83 {
84  bool bool_value;
85  utils::binary::read(stream, bool_value);
86  value = bool_value;
87 }
88 
97 void read(std::istream &stream, std::string &string)
98 {
99  size_t size;
100  read(stream, size);
101  char * cstring = new char [size];
102  read(stream, cstring, size);
103  string = cstring;
104  delete[] cstring;
105 }
106 
107 }
108 
109 }
110 
111 }
